Row.Text: Disables the tech cost discount awarded to teams that is based on the fraction of teams in the game that already have the tech.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Disables the tech cost discount awarded to teams that is based on the fraction of teams in the game that already have the tech.
